Detailed Description

template<class CVertex, class CEdge, class CFace, class CHalfEdge>
class MeshLib::CBaseEmbed< CVertex, CEdge, CFace, CHalfEdge >

CBaseEmbed class.

embed a mesh with canonical metric onto the canonical domain
